content.text: Hi, I'm [name].
Hi [name], I'm [name].
What do you do for a living?
I work as a kennel cleaner at an animal shelter.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to work with animals.
It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
I can imagine. So, what kind of animals do you work with?
We have dogs, cats, rabbits, and guinea pigs.
Oh, that's a lot of variety!
Yeah, it's always fun to see what kind of animals we'll get in next.
I bet. So, do you like your job?
I do, for the most part. It can be a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding. I love getting to know the animals and helping them find homes.
That's great. So, what's your favorite thing about your job?
My favorite thing is probably getting to know the animals and helping them find homes. It's so rewarding to see them go to loving families.
That's so nice. So, what's your least favorite thing about your job?
My least favorite thing is probably when we have to euthanize an animal. It's always hard to say goodbye to a pet, especially when it's one that you've gotten to know and love.
I know what you mean. That must be really tough.
It is, but it's also part of the job. We have to make sure that the animals are being treated humanely, even when it's difficult.
I'm sure you do. So, what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I might stay here for a while, or I might move on to a different job. I'm still trying to figure it out.
Well, I'm sure you'll find something great. You seem like a really hard worker.
Thank you. I appreciate that.
